name: The Witches of Luminoire
description:
Accepted to the all-girls school of magic, Luminoire Academy, you have one week to prepare for the Full Moon Banquet with one of three charming witches. Play through this witchy dating game, and discover the secrets Luminoire Academy has to offer!

Credits

Programming: Haocheng M., Amina Penafiel, Everlee Mai

Writing & Copyediting: Izzy C. Arcinue, JH Ronk, Ray K., Amina Penafiel, Lesley Galvan

Art: Alexis Lee, Alice T., Daphne F., Sophie T (@on5li7)

Music & SFX: Daphne F., Santiago Tavarez, Corwin Grably-Shrager
